name: Baobab
description: Baobab is a graphic tool to analyze the usage status of hard disk with an easy-to-use interface. It can analyze the space of local hard disk, mounted hard disk and device. The analysis results is shown in the shape of a ring or a tree.

en_US.description: Baobab is a graphic tool to analyze the usage status of hard disk with an easy-to-use interface. It can analyze the space of local hard disk, mounted hard disk and device. The analysis results is shown in the shape of a ring or a tree.
en_US.name: Baobab

zh_CN.description: Baobab是一款分析磁盘使用情况的图形工具，它可以分析本地硬盘空间、分析挂载硬盘或设备空间，同时界面简单易操作，且分析结果以环状或树形状显示。
zh_CN.name: Baobab
